main_definition: Shorter refers to something that has less length or duration compared to others, often in terms of height, size, time, or distance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Less in height or vertical extent
meanings_and_examples.example: The short man struggled to reach items on the top shelf.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Fewer words, time, or distance required
meanings_and_examples.example: A shorter meeting was scheduled for just 15 minutes instead of an hour.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Smaller size or lesser duration in various contexts
meanings_and_examples.example: This model has a shorter battery life than the previous one.

context_examples.definition: Less time, such as a brief period
context_examples.example: The weekend was too short for me to relax properly.

context_examples.definition: Fewer pages in a book or article
context_examples.example: This shorter novel is still captivating and engaging.
